h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: After the boss fight in The Emerald Hall, follow the path until you reach the Crimson-Silver Cart. You'll find the Pale-Axe Stalwart here fighting the cart if you've exhausted his dialogue at the previous location.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Defeat Crimson-Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
After the boss fight in The Emerald Hall, follow the path until you reach the Crimson-Silver Cart. You'll find the Pale-Axe Stalwart here fighting the cart if you've exhausted his dialogue at the previous location.
